entry.title: New release for Fladder: v0.7.0
entry.content:
Fladder v0.7.0 ‚Äì UI 1.5 and More! üéâ

This release brings a visual overhaul and multiple usability enhancements.

Highlights üåü

  • UI Redesign (UI 1.5): A cleaner, more responsive design.
  • New Library tab for easier navigating of multiple libraries recommendations.
  • A improved navigation rail for large screens.
  • Scrolling and rendering are now noticeably faster throughout the app.
  • Items now use correct aspect ratios and type indicators for those library types.

Exciting New Features üèï

  • feat: Video BufferSize settings for MPV by @Julien9969 in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/314
  • feat: Playbackrate changes - max set to 3 and smaller steps by @Julien9969 in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/326
  • feat: Improve segments visibility logic by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/346
  • feat: Add max concurrent downloads to settings by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/347
  • feat: Player track remember when not default by @Julien9969 in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/339
  • feat: UI 1.5 and other Improvements by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/357
  • feat: HTPC mode startup argument (-a --htpc) by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/358
  • feat: Ask for playback type when media is downloaded by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/361
  • feat: Added update notification and download links per platform by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/362

Bugfixes üêû

  • fix: Ends at calculation when playbackrate is not 1x by @Julien9969 in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/325
  • fix: Added missing display profiles by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/341
  • fix: Filter buttons not working by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/342
  • fix: Remove specials from nextUp selection by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/343
  • fix: Update playback position when paused by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/344
  • fix: Shuffle play videos by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/345
  • fix: Use sortName instead of name for searches/library views by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/359
  • fix: Media segments not loading when pressing play on Series poster by @PartyDonut in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/360

Other Changes

  • chore: Updated translations from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/308
  • chore: Added Development.md by @Julien9969 in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/328
  • chore: Changed case naming for Mac OS App by @vikingnope in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/349
  • chore: Updated translations from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/323

New Contributors

  • @Julien9969 made their first contribution in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/314
  • @vikingnope made their first contribution in https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/pull/349

Full Changelog: https://github.com/DonutWare/Fladder/compare/v0.6.2...v0.7.0
